Attire

Formal

(i.e., suit or dress)

Matt says, "It's our wedding. Dress up for us!"

Travel

For those of you that live outside the Carolinas, we recommend flying into Charlotte Douglas International Airport on Friday, September 12 or Saturday, September 13.

Plan to rent a car for the 2.5 hour drive to Banner Elk from Charlotte, or let us know if you want to carpool with one of us Charlotteans.

Accommodations

You are welcome to stay wherever you are the most comfortable in the Banner Elk or Boone area. Some options include:

  • Blue Ridge Mountain Rentals
  • Holiday Inn Boone
  • Graystone Lodge Boone
  • Courtyard by Marriott Boone
  • Best Western Banner Elk

FAQ

Can I bring my pets?

Yes! The White Crow is a pet-friendly venue.

Will Bijou be there?

Sadly no, but she will be sassing us in spirit.

Inside or outside?

The ceremony will be outside, and the reception will be both inside and outside (weather-contingent). Bring a jacket!

Do you have a registry?

No, we simply request your presence. If you'd like to give us something, we will accept red envelope money!

Will there be other events for those who aren't attending the wedding?

We plan to hold an informal event at a later date for those who are not attending our ceremony. This will give everyone a chance to celebrate with us.

Bijou will be there in spirit.
